title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“I came within a hare's breath of running for Congress. ... ” [From an interview in the Beaumont Enterprise, March 25, 1985. Submitted by Winfred S. Emmons, Beaumont, Texas.]
